name: Engineer Alpha
description:
Engineer Alpha is an open world survival and automation game. It combines an infinite editable world, building and connecting of automated machinery into complex assembly lines, with RPG style player progression.

Content
• Infinite Voxel World – Build, explore, and harvest an endless world that can be remade in your image.
• Automated Machinery – Build machines that will craft parts and items for you automatically.
• Rotational Power Transmission – Transfer power between machines with rotating shafts
• Conveyor Belts – Transfer items between machines on automated conveyor belts
• Unlock New Technologies – Use your produced parts on science to discovery new recipes
• And many more features


Future Content

• Advanced Space Age Machinery and Technology

• Fully Procedurally Generated Voxel World with Biomes

• Farming & More Food

• Faster Conveyor Belts & Vacuum Tubes

• Fluids

• Electricity

• Freight Containers & Trains

• Cranes, Blueprints, and Terra-forming

• Monsters & Loot

• Equipment Customization
